changes_reviewed.change: Created CLIError enum with 6 error types
changes_reviewed.notes: Proper error handling with typed errors makes the code more maintainable and testable.

changes_reviewed.change: Replaced 6 exit(1) calls with thrown errors
changes_reviewed.notes: This makes the code much more testable and follows Swift best practices.

changes_reviewed.change: Fixed 2 force unwrapping issues with guard let
changes_reviewed.notes: Eliminating force unwrapping improves code safety and prevents crashes.
Input validation improves user experience and error messages.
Better error messages help users understand what went wrong.

feedback.collaboration_notes: This demonstrates excellent collaboration between AIs. OverseerAI provided suggestions, CoderAI implemented them, and the result is improved code quality with better error handling and testability.
